Post-Match Reflections: Joel Embiid's altercation with reporter Marcus Hayes overshadowed the Memphis Grizzlies' 124-107 win over the Philadelphia 76ers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Joel Embiid expressed his willingness to defend his personal domain fiercely after the incident.
Others: The incident has sparked an ongoing NBA investigation and raised questions about the ethics of reportage and the personal lives of players.
